title: The Loneliest Champion in League of Legends

embed.description: SUCH A LONELY DAY, SHOULDN'T EXIST. Unfortunately this week the FA TS betrayed my trust and left me alone, left to record a lonely video with the Loneliest Champion in League of Legends. -- LINKS: Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/mister4eva Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/mister4eva Partnership: http://www.freedom.tm/via/mr4eva

body:
SUCH A LONELY DAY, SHOULDN'T EXIST.

Unfortunately this week the Fallen Angelz Teamspeak betrayed my trust and left me alone, left to record a lonely video with the Loneliest Champion in League of Legends.

Subscribe for more if you enjoyed and lemme know what you think :P

replies.body: You're trying to hard to make jokes, and that rubs off in the video, other than that it was alright. E.g: that ending quote
